Raptors Basketball Academy, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Raptors, bụ otu egwuregwu basketball nke Naijiria nke dị na Lagos
Otu egwuregwu bọọlụ a na-arụ ọrụ na  Premier League nke Naịjirịa.
Onye nkuzi Charles Ibeziakor guzobere otu ahụ na 2001 dị ka Spiders
N'afọ 2006, ọ gbanwere aha ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Raptors dịka ihe na-arutu aka na Toronto Raptors

N'afọ 2019, Raptors mere nke mbụ ha na Premier League. N'oge izizi ya, Raptors ruru na ngwụcha nke 2019 NBBF President Cup mgbe ha meriri Niger Potters wee ruo na ngwucha egwuregwu ahụ. Na ngwụcha, Rivers Hoopers meriri ndị otu ahụ.
